name: Minin' Away
description:
This is a small game about mining and selling everything you get. 

You start with only a wooden pickaxe and sword and you have to progress up until you have diamond gear. Sell things at the shop. Buy dynamites. Explode a bunch of cows. Collect all the loot and repeat.

You play as this guy and you kill cows, mine and sell everything.

How to play:

WASD - move

Space - dash

Left Click - use tool

E - interact

1, 2 - switch tools

You spawn in a town called torrine. Your objective is to go mine ores and crystals then sell them for coins at the shop for which you can better tools.  Smelt iron and gold ores at the blacksmith and sell them for better value.
